name: WGW KT 传送门世界 王国传说 Warp Gate World Kingdom Tales
name_original: WGW KT 传送门世界 王国传说 Warp Gate World Kingdom Tales
description:
This is a high degree of freedom single player battle chess game.
You can pass the level by entering any teleportation gate within the level.
BOSS can freely choose whether to fight or not.
There are various rewards for defeating bosses.
You can save at the beginning of each round.
The stronghold interface allows for job transfer.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Attention! If the game starts flashing, you can try running game.exe directly from the game installation directory to solve the problem.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Entering any teleportation gate allows you to pass through the current level, but rewards require defeating specific enemies to be obtained.
104 light attribute professions (players can transfer),
104 dark attribute professions,
----------------------------------------------------
By default, there are 20 attacking characters,
Using remote units and air forces can reduce the difficulty of the game,
------------------
If you want to experience higher difficulty,
So, I suggest,
With only 15 people and others standing still, the game will become even more difficult,
With only 10 people on standby, the game will become even more difficult,
With only 5 people and others standing still, the game will become even more difficult,
Using only melee army units, the game will become even more difficult,
You can also choose 20 attack characters from any of the 339 available characters,
----------------------------------------------------

There is currently no two week list, and there may be more in the future,
All levels have a teleportation gate that returns to the teleportation hall. If you cannot defeat it, you can come back to practice at any time,
Among them,
------------------
Empire 20 levels,
------------------
20 levels in the Kingdom of Mountains,
------------------
Desert Kingdom 20 levels,
------------------
If you start to attack the Tower of Trials, it will be difficult. It is recommended to challenge around LV10,
You can freely teleport between levels of the same level, such as Empire 1, Mountain Kingdom 1, Desert Kingdom 1, and Empire 1 (convenient for brushing items and experiences),
When a certain level cannot be reached, you can also switch paths,
------------------
I don't have a two-week schedule at the moment because I don't know how to make it yet,
----------------------------------------------------
Game Help:
1. Enter any portal to clear the level,
The bottom conveyor door leads to the corresponding conveyor hall,
3 f4=full screen,
4. Equipment is very important,
5 different armor attributes can be stacked,
The growth rates of different professions and attributes vary,
7 different weapons will have different growth rate bonuses,
The ability of enemies with 8 dark attributes is affected by difficulty,
----------------------------------------------------
Currently, there are a total of 106 difficulties,
------------------
Normal, with a basic experience value of 1. Normal difficulty level (capable of critical strikes) (capable of counterattacks),
------------------
Normal 1, basic experience value 1 attribute correction+1 (speed and movement not added) (can critical strike) (can counterattack),
Ordinary 2, basic experience value 2 attribute correction+2 (speed and movement not added) (can critical strike) (can counterattack),
Normal 3, basic experience value 3 attribute correction+3 (speed and movement not added) (can critical strike) (can counterattack),
------------------
Difficulty 1 to Difficulty 100 (this series is the highest difficulty),
------------------
Basic experience value 1, attribute correction+1 (without movement) (can critical strike) (can counterattack) (can attack again) (double experience) (initialization random number for reading files),
Basic experience value of 100, attribute correction+100 (without movement) (can critically strike) (can counterattack) (can attack again) (double experience) (initialization random number for reading files),

----------------------------------------------------
There are a total of 339 characters that players can use,
170 special characters with light attributes (each with different growth) (the first 20 characters are team leaders),
7 NPC characters with light attributes (each with different growth),
58 ordinary characters with light attributes (initial level 1) (initial attribute 1) (initial HP 20) (growth HP 90 strength, 60 magic 10 skills, 60 speed, 50 movement, 40 defense, 30 magic defense, 20 magic defense),
104 ordinary characters with dark attributes (initial level 1) (initial attribute 1) (initial HP 1) (growth HP 90 strength, 60 magic, 10 skills, 60 speed, 50 movement, 40 defense, 30 magic defense, 20 magic defense),
